lexUnit.definition: COD: an event constituting a new stage in a changing situation.

sentence.text: The Moscow newspaper Komsomolskaya Pravda suggested that one of the reasons why Pogosyan was resigning was that for several days he had been unable to secure an audience with Gorbachev to discuss developments in Armenia .
